1254 here.add_splatter( type_gib, p->pos(), rng( corpse->size + 2, ( corpse->size + 1 ) * 2 ) );
1255 here.add_splatter( type_blood, p->pos(), rng( corpse->size + 2, ( corpse->size + 1 ) * 2 ) );
1256 for( int i = 1; i <= corpse->size; i++ ) {
1257 here.add_splatter_trail( type_gib, p->pos(), random_entry( here.points_in_radius( p->pos(),
1258 corpse->size + 1 ) ) );
1259 here.add_splatter_trail( type_blood, p->pos(), random_entry( here.points_in_radius( p->pos(),
1260 corpse->size + 1 ) ) );
1261 }
1262
1263 // Ready to move on to the next item, if there is one
1264 act->index = true;
1265 return;
1266 }
1267 // function just for drop yields
1268 const auto roll_drops = [&]() {
1269 factor = std::max( factor, -50 );
1270 return 0.5 * skill_level / 10 + 0.3 * ( factor + 50 ) / 100 + 0.2 * p->dex_cur / 20;
1271 };
1272 // all action types - yields
1273 butchery_drops_harvest( &corpse_item, *corpse, *p, roll_butchery, action, roll_drops );
1274 // after this point, if there was a liquid handling from the harvest,
1275 // and the liquid handling was interrupted, then the activity was canceled,
1276 // therefore operations on this activities targets and values may be invalidated.
1277 // reveal hidden items / hidden content
1278 if( action == DISSECT ) {
1279 int roll = roll_butchery() - corpse_item.damage_level( 4 );
1280 roll = roll < 0 ? 0 : roll;
1281 add_msg( m_debug, _( "Roll penalty for corpse damage = %s" ), 0 - corpse_item.damage_level( 4 ) );
1282 std::list<item> cbms = corpse_item.components;
1283 for( const item *it : corpse_item.contents.all_items_top() ) {
1284 cbms.push_back( *it );
1285 }
1286 extract_or_wreck_cbms( cbms, roll, *p );
1287 // those lines are for XP gain with dissecting. It depends on the size of the corpse, time to dissect the corpse and the amount of bionics you would gather.
1288 int time_to_cut = size_factor_in_time_to_cut( corpse->size );
1289 int level_cap = std::min<int>( MAX_SKILL, ( corpse->size + ( cbms.size() * 2 + 1 ) ) );
1290 int size_mult = corpse->size > MS_MEDIUM ? ( corpse->size * corpse->size ) : 8;
1291 int practice_amt = ( size_mult + 1 ) * ( ( time_to_cut / 150 ) + 1 ) *
1292 ( cbms.size() * cbms.size() / 2 + 1 );
1293 p->practice( skill_firstaid, practice_amt, level_cap );
1294 add_msg( m_debug, "Experience: %d, Level cap: %d, Time to cut: %d", practice_amt, level_cap,
1295 time_to_cut );
1296 }
1297
1298 //end messages and effects
1299 switch( action ) {
1300 case QUARTER:
1301 break;
1302 case BUTCHER:
1303 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good,
1304 _( "You apply few quick cuts to the %s and leave what's left of it for scavengers." ),
1305 corpse_item.tname() );
1306
1307 // Remove the target from the map
1308 target.remove_item();
1309 if( !act->targets.empty() ) {
1310 act->targets.pop_back();
1311 }
1312 break;
1313 case BUTCHER_FULL:
1314 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You finish butchering the %s." ), corpse_item.tname() );
1315
1316 // Remove the target from the map
1317 target.remove_item();
1318 if( !act->targets.empty() ) {
1319 act->targets.pop_back();
1320 }
1321 break;
1322 case F_DRESS:
1323 // partial failure
1324 if( roll_butchery() < 0 ) {
1325 switch( rng( 1, 3 ) ) {
1326 case 1:
1327 p->add_msg_if_player( m_warning,
1328 _( "You unskillfully hack up the corpse and chop off some excess body parts. You're left wondering how you did so poorly." ) );
1329 break;
1330 case 2:
1331 p->add_msg_if_player( m_warning,
1332 _( "Your unskilled hands slip and damage the corpse. You still hope it's not a total waste though." ) );
1333 break;
1334 case 3:
1335 p->add_msg_if_player( m_warning,
1336 _( "You did something wrong and hacked the corpse badly. Maybe it's still recoverable." ) );
1337 break;
1338 }
1339 corpse_item.set_flag( "FIELD_DRESS_FAILED" );
1340
1341 here.add_splatter( type_gib, p->pos(), rng( corpse->size + 2, ( corpse->size + 1 ) * 2 ) );
1342 here.add_splatter( type_blood, p->pos(), rng( corpse->size + 2, ( corpse->size + 1 ) * 2 ) );
1343 for( int i = 1; i <= corpse->size; i++ ) {
1344 here.add_splatter_trail( type_gib, p->pos(), random_entry( here.points_in_radius( p->pos(),
1345 corpse->size + 1 ) ) );
1346 here.add_splatter_trail( type_blood, p->pos(), random_entry( here.points_in_radius( p->pos(),
1347 corpse->size + 1 ) ) );
1348 }
1349
1350 } else {
1351 // success
1352 switch( rng( 1, 3 ) ) {
1353 case 1:
1354 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You field dress the %s." ), corpse->nname() );
1355 break;
1356 case 2:
1357 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good,
1358 _( "You slice the corpse's belly and remove intestines and organs, until you're confident that it will not rot from inside." ) );
1359 break;
1360 case 3:
1361 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good,
1362 _( "You remove guts and excess parts, preparing the corpse for later use." ) );
1363 break;
1364 }
1365 corpse_item.set_flag( flag_FIELD_DRESS );
1366
1367 here.add_splatter( type_gib, p->pos(), rng( corpse->size + 2, ( corpse->size + 1 ) * 2 ) );
1368 here.add_splatter( type_blood, p->pos(), rng( corpse->size + 2, ( corpse->size + 1 ) * 2 ) );
1369 for( int i = 1; i <= corpse->size; i++ ) {
1370 here.add_splatter_trail( type_gib, p->pos(), random_entry( here.points_in_radius( p->pos(),
1371 corpse->size + 1 ) ) );
1372 here.add_splatter_trail( type_blood, p->pos(), random_entry( here.points_in_radius( p->pos(),
1373 corpse->size + 1 ) ) );
1374 }
1375
1376 }
1377 if( !act->targets.empty() ) {
1378 act->targets.pop_back();
1379 }
1380 break;
1381 case SKIN:
1382 switch( rng( 1, 4 ) ) {
1383 case 1:
1384 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You skin the %s." ), corpse->nname() );
1385 break;
1386 case 2:
1387 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You carefully remove the hide from the %s" ),
1388 corpse->nname() );
1389 break;
1390 case 3:
1391 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good,
1392 _( "The %s is challenging to skin, but you get a good hide from it." ),
1393 corpse->nname() );
1394 break;
1395 case 4:
1396 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "With a few deft slices you take the skin from the %s" ),
1397 corpse->nname() );
1398 break;
1399 }
1400 corpse_item.set_flag( flag_SKINNED );
1401 if( !act->targets.empty() ) {
1402 act->targets.pop_back();
1403 }
1404 break;
1405 case DISMEMBER:
1406 switch( rng( 1, 3 ) ) {
1407 case 1:
1408 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You hack the %s apart." ), corpse_item.tname() );
1409 break;
1410 case 2:
1411 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You lop the limbs off the %s." ), corpse_item.tname() );
1412 break;
1413 case 3:
1414 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You cleave the %s into pieces." ), corpse_item.tname() );
1415 }
1416
1417 // Remove the target from the map
1418 target.remove_item();
1419 if( !act->targets.empty() ) {
1420 act->targets.pop_back();
1421 }
1422 break;
1423 case DISSECT:
1424 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You finish dissecting the %s." ), corpse_item.tname() );
1425
1426 // Remove the target from the map
1427 target.remove_item();
1428 if( !act->targets.empty() ) {
1429 act->targets.pop_back();
1430 }
1431 break;
1432 }
1433
1434 // Ready to move on to the next item, if there is one (for example if multibutchering)
1435 act->index = true;
1436 // if its mutli-tile butchering,then restart the backlog.
1437 resume_for_multi_activities( *p );
1438}

4201 for( const tripoint &elem : here.points_in_radius( pos, 1 ) ) {
4202 bool cantuse = false;
4203 tripoint direc = elem - pos;
4204 tripoint proposed_to = pos + point( 3 * direction.x, 3 * direction.y );
4205 std::vector<tripoint> rough_tree_line = line_to( pos, proposed_to );
4206 for( const tripoint &elem : rough_tree_line ) {
4207 // Try not to drop onto a critter
4208 if( g->critter_at( elem ) ) {
4209 cantuse = true;
4210 break;
4211 }
4212
4213 ter_t ter = here.ter( elem ).obj();
4214 furn_t furn = here.furn( elem ).obj();
4215 // Furniture / Terrain test
4216 if( elem != pos && ( ter.bash.str_max != -1 || ( furn.id && furn.bash.str_max != -1 ) ) ) {
4217 cantuse = true;
4218 break;
4219 }
4220 // Vehicle check
4221 if( veh_pointer_or_null( here.veh_at( elem ) ) ) {
4222 cantuse = true;
4223 break;
4224 }
4225 }
4226 if( !cantuse ) {
4227 // Passed all tests for safe direction, add to the possible routes
4228 valid_directions.push_back( direc );
4229 }
4230 }
4231 // Select a random valid direction, or none if empty
4232 direction = random_entry( valid_directions, direction );
4233 }
4234
4235 const tripoint to = pos + 3 * direction.xy() + point( rng( -1, 1 ), rng( -1, 1 ) );
4236 std::vector<tripoint> tree = line_to( pos, to, rng( 1, 8 ) );
4237 for( const tripoint &elem : tree ) {
4238 here.batter( elem, 300, 5 );
4239 here.ter_set( elem, t_trunk );
4240 }
4241
4242 here.ter_set( pos, t_stump );

4244 // sound of falling tree
4245 sfx::play_variant_sound( "misc", "timber",
4246 sfx::get_heard_volume( here.getlocal( act->placement ) ) );
4247 act->set_to_null();
4248
4249 // Quality of tool used and assistants can together both reduce intensity of work.
4250 if( act->targets.empty() ) {
4251 debugmsg( "woodcutting item location not set" );
4252 resume_for_multi_activities( *p );
4253 return;
4254 }
4255
4256 item_location &loc = act->targets[ 0 ];
4257 item *it = loc.get_item();
4258 if( it == nullptr ) {
4259 debugmsg( "woodcutting item location lost" );
4260 resume_for_multi_activities( *p );
4261 return;
4262 }
4263
4264 int act_exertion = iuse::chop_moves( *p, *it );
4265 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You finish chopping down a tree." ) );
4266 const std::vector<npc *> helpers = character_funcs::get_crafting_helpers( *p, 3 );
4267 act_exertion = act_exertion * ( 10 - helpers.size() ) / 10;
4268
4269 p->mod_stored_kcal( std::min( -1, -act_exertion / to_moves<int>( 80_seconds ) ) );
4270 p->mod_thirst( std::max( 1, act_exertion / to_moves<int>( 12_minutes ) ) );
4271 p->mod_fatigue( std::max( 1, act_exertion / to_moves<int>( 6_minutes ) ) );
4272
4273 resume_for_multi_activities( *p );

4763 if( spell_being_cast.range() > 0 && !spell_being_cast.is_valid_target( target_none ) &&
4764 !spell_being_cast.has_flag( RANDOM_TARGET ) ) {
4765 do {
4766 avatar &you = *p->as_avatar();
4767 std::vector<tripoint> trajectory = target_handler::mode_spell( you, spell_being_cast, no_fail,
4768 no_mana );
4769
4770 if( !trajectory.empty() ) {
4771 target = trajectory.back();
4772 target_is_valid = spell_being_cast.is_valid_target( *p, target );
4773 if( !( spell_being_cast.is_valid_target( target_ground ) || p->sees( target ) ) ) {
4774 target_is_valid = false;
4775 }
4776 } else {
4777 target_is_valid = false;
4778 }
4779 if( !target_is_valid ) {
4780 if( query_yn( _( "Stop casting spell? Time spent will be lost." ) ) ) {
4781 return;
4782 }
4783 }
4784 } while( !target_is_valid );
4785 } else if( spell_being_cast.has_flag( RANDOM_TARGET ) ) {
4786 const std::optional<tripoint> target_ = spell_being_cast.random_valid_target( *p, p->pos() );
4787 if( !target_ ) {
4788 p->add_msg_if_player( game_message_params{ m_bad, gmf_bypass_cooldown },
4789 _( "Your spell can't find a suitable target." ) );
4790 return;
4791 }
4792 target = *target_;
4793 }
4794
4795 // no turning back now. it's all said and done.
4796 bool success = no_fail || rng_float( 0.0f, 1.0f ) >= spell_being_cast.spell_fail( *p );
4797 int exp_gained = spell_being_cast.casting_exp( *p );
4798 if( !success ) {
4799 p->add_msg_if_player( game_message_params{ m_bad, gmf_bypass_cooldown },
4800 _( "You lose your concentration!" ) );
4801 if( !spell_being_cast.is_max_level() && level_override == -1 ) {
4802 // still get some experience for trying
4803 spell_being_cast.gain_exp( exp_gained / 5 );
4804 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You gain %i experience. New total %i." ), exp_gained / 5,
4805 spell_being_cast.xp() );
4806 }
4807 return;
4808 }
4809
4810 if( spell_being_cast.has_flag( spell_flag::VERBAL ) ) {
4811 sounds::sound( p->pos(), p->get_shout_volume() / 2, sounds::sound_t::speech, _( "cast a spell" ),
4812 false );
4813 }
4814
4815 p->add_msg_if_player( spell_being_cast.message(), spell_being_cast.name() );
4816
4817 spell_being_cast.cast_all_effects( *p, target );
4818
4819 if( !no_mana ) {
4820 // pay the cost
4821 int cost = spell_being_cast.energy_cost( *p );
4822 switch( spell_being_cast.energy_source() ) {
4823 case mana_energy:
4824 p->magic->mod_mana( *p, -cost );
4825 break;
4826 case stamina_energy:
4827 p->mod_stamina( -cost );
4828 break;
4829 case bionic_energy:
4830 p->mod_power_level( -units::from_kilojoule( cost ) );
4831 break;
4832 case hp_energy:
4833 blood_magic( p, cost );
4834 break;
4835 case fatigue_energy:
4836 p->mod_fatigue( cost );
4837 break;
4838 case none_energy:
4839 default:
4840 break;
4841 }
4842 }
4843 if( level_override == -1 ) {
4844 if( !spell_being_cast.is_max_level() ) {
4845 // reap the reward
4846 int old_level = spell_being_cast.get_level();
4847 if( old_level == 0 ) {
4848 spell_being_cast.gain_level();
4849 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good,
4850 _( "Something about how this spell works just clicked! You gained a level!" ) );
4851 } else {
4852 spell_being_cast.gain_exp( exp_gained );
4853 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You gain %i experience. New total %i." ), exp_gained,
4854 spell_being_cast.xp() );
4855 }
4856 if( spell_being_cast.get_level() != old_level ) {
4857 g->events().send<event_type::player_levels_spell>( spell_being_cast.id(),
4858 spell_being_cast.get_level() );
4859 }
4860 }
4861 }
4862 if( !act->targets.empty() && act->targets.front() ) {
4863 item &it = *act->targets.front();
4864 if( !it.has_flag( "USE_PLAYER_ENERGY" ) ) {
4865 p->consume_charges( it, it.type->charges_to_use() );
4866 }
4867 }
